content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, and I'm here to help you get your HVAC needs taken care of. Can I please have your name to get started?
Hi there! My name is Lydia.
Thank you, Lydia! Could you please provide the address where you'd like us to take care of your HVAC issue?
Great, thank you! Can you please briefly describe the HVAC issue you're experiencing so we can be prepared for your appointment?
Our AC just isn't cooling properly. It runs, but it's not getting cold in the house.
Thanks for letting us know! When would be the best time for a technician to come take a look at your AC?
I actually need to check with my husband first before scheduling anything. Can I get back to you?
Of course, Lydia! You can reply to this text anytime when you're ready to schedule, or let us know if you have any questions. We'll be here to help whenever you're ready.
reason: Customer needs spouse's approval before scheduling.
